title: Capturing the Joyful Spirit of a Montana General Store
description: The stateâ€™s oldest continually open general store serves customers in Fishtail from all walks of life, from ranchers and miners to doctors and C.E.O.s.
dc:creator: Janie Osborne
media:description: One of only a few businesses in town, the store, with its bright red trim, is hard to miss.
